title: Price Drop FS- High End HOF - Cobb, Wagner, etc.
author: Rhotchkiss

posts.post_title: Price Drop FS- High End HOF - Cobb, Wagner, etc.
posts.post_content:
One last price reduction before the weekend.  looking for Offers.  I can send better pics/scans on request.

D304 Brunners, Honus Wagner, PSA 3 -- [STRIKE]$5,250[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$5,000[/STRIKE] $4,800

T227 Cobb, Miners Extra back, PSA 3 (undergraded IMO) -- [STRIKE]$6,500[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$6,250[/STRIKE] $6,000

E253 Oxford Confectionry Cobb, PSA 5.5 -- [STRIKE]$6,000[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$5,800[/STRIKE] (A PSA 7 recently sold for $12k, asking less than half) $5,500

1910 Orange Borders, Honus Wagner, PSA A -- [STRIKE]$1,800[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$1,650 [/STRIKE](crazy rare card) $1,550

T211 Red Sun, Steele, SGC 50 -- [STRIKE]$650[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$600[/STRIKE] (tough card/condition) $575

D359 Cy Morgan, SGC 20 -- [STRIKE]$550[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$500[/STRIKE] $450 (rare card)

E901-B Joe Tinker, PSA 5 -- [STRIKE]$550[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$525[/STRIKE] $500 (tough card; a PSA 6 type A recently sold for $910 and last type B PSA 5 sold for $550 in 2013).
Bump for new cards, prices and new pics added; I can email better scans/pics upon request.  [url]Rhotchkiss@horizonlandco.com[/url]
Bump for Price reductions.  Looking for offers
One last bump for further price reduction.
